product_name: TYR Competitor Tri Shorts - Men's 9" Inseam
long_description: WIth a 9 in. inseam for plenty of coverage, the TYR Competitor Tri Shorts for men feature smooth, strong fabric that stays in place so you can swim, bike and run in total comfort. Stretch polyester fabric wicks moisture away from skin; 4-way stretch allows complete freedom of motion. Built-in UPF 50+ sun protection shields skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Compression fit supports muscles to reduce fatigue. Thin, lightweight polyester chamois adds comfort on the bike, resists odors and won't soak up water during the swim. Elastic silicone leg grippers keep the TYR Competitor Tri Shorts from riding up; rear zippered pocket stores race-day essentials such as energy gels.
short_description: WIth a 9 in. inseam for plenty of coverage, the TYR Competitor Tri Shorts for men feature smooth, strong fabric that stays in place so you can swim, bike and run in total comfort.
